map: function getMonday(dateString) { var dateString = dateString.replace(/-/g, '/'); var date = new Date(dateString); var day = date.getDay(), diff = date.getDate() - day + (day == 0 ? -6:1); return new Date(date.setDate(diff)).toLocaleDateString(); }; function(doc) { if(doc.documentType == 'DosageAdherenceLog') { emit([doc.patientId, getMonday(doc.dosageDate)], {"taken":doc.dosageStatus=="TAKEN"?1:0, "date": getMonday(doc.dosageDate)}) } }
reduce: function (key, values) {var taken_array = values.map(function(elt) {return elt.taken}); return {"weekStartDate" : values[0].date, "taken":sum(taken_array), "total":values.length};}
